overview: Amir and his friends have a righteous anger against the Ayatollah state, and a rather eccentric plan for how they can give it shape:  They cobble together a really trashy, scruffy anti-Khomeini video, which should then be secretly distributed around Iran and carry out its subsersive effects. When the Iranian secret service gets wind of this tape, the hunt begins, blood will flow. Battle zone cinema.
title: Lange Schatten
